message: Let's make a deal. I take $90, you take $10. It's in your best interest to accept now, as the value of the money will decrease for you in the next round.
Let's split the money more evenly. I'll take $55 and you can have $45.  We both get a decent amount, and we don't have to worry about the money losing value in the next round.
Bob, this is your last chance for a decent share. I'm offering you $15. Accept this, or face a worse offer in the next round when the money is worth even less to you.

Alice, I understand you want a larger share, but I'm not willing to accept such a lopsided deal. This offer gives you a good amount while still giving me a reasonable share. Let's settle this now before the inflation hurts us both further.
